meanings.definition: A piece of furniture designed for one person to sit on, with a support for the back.
meanings.sent1: The chairs in the room were comfortable.
meanings.sent2: Please take a seat on one of the chairs.
meanings.sent3: The chairs at the party seemed to be having a chat.
meanings.sent4: The empty chairs in the theater echoed loneliness.
meanings.sent5: The antique chairs in the museum told stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The person in charge of a meeting or organization.
meanings.sent1: The chairs led the discussion during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The new CEO will be taking over as chairs of the board.
meanings.sent3: The chairs at the office party were surprisingly good dancers.
meanings.sent4: She ruled the company with the authority of a thousand chairs.
meanings.sent5: The chairs' decisions shaped the future of the organization.

meanings.sent1: He held the prestigious chairs in physics at the university.
meanings.sent2: The chairs of different departments gathered for a conference.
meanings.sent3: The chairs at the faculty meeting were always the first to arrive.
meanings.sent4: She aspired to attain the chairs in literature one day.
meanings.sent5: The chairs' knowledge inspired generations of students.
